item.title: Learning Istio | JWT Auth
item.description: In this post, we will be looking at how Istio handles end user authentication/authorization based on JSON Web Tokens (JWT). JWT is commonly used in OAuth2.0 flows to specify the resources a client has access to, but there are a couple of things to verify before the client is given access: Is the JWT issued by the right party Is the client who they claim to be The logic for the checks above are usually coded into the application.
